  <property name='tokens' value='ASSIGN, BAND, BAND_ASSIGN, BOR, BOR_ASSIGN, BSR, BSR_ASSIGN, BXOR, BXOR_ASSIGN, COLON, COMMA, DIV, DIV_ASSIGN, DO_WHILE, DOT, ELLIPSIS, EQUAL, GE, GT, LAND, LCURLY, LE, LITERAL_ASSERT, LITERAL_CATCH, LITERAL_DO, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_FOR, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_RETURN, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED, LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_WHILE, LT, MINUS, MINUS_ASSIGN, MOD, MOD_ASSIGN, NOT_EQUAL, PLUS, PLUS_ASSIGN, RCURLY, SL, SLIST, SL_ASSIGN, SR, SR_ASSIGN, STAR, STAR_ASSIGN, METHOD_CALL, LITERAL_NEW, QUESTION, LITERAL_INSTANCEOF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_THIS, LITERAL_SUPER, LITERAL_SWITCH, LITERAL_CASE, LITERAL_BREAK, LITERAL_CONTINUE, LITERAL_CLASS, LITERAL_INTERFACE, LITERAL_ENUM, LITERAL_PACKAGE, LITERAL_IMPORT, LITERAL_STATIC, LITERAL_TRANSIENT, LITERAL_VOLATILE, LITERAL_PUBLIC, LITERAL_PROTECTED, LITERAL_PRIVATE, LITERAL_ABSTRACT, LITERAL_FINAL, LITERAL_NATIVE, LITERAL_STRICTFP, LITERAL_DEFAULT, LITERAL_SYNCHRONIZED, LITERAL_TRANSIENT, LITERAL_VOLATILE, LITERAL_PUBLIC, LITERAL_PROTECTED, LITERAL_PRIVATE, LITERAL_ABSTRACT, LITERAL_FINAL, LITERAL_NATIVE, LITERAL_STRICTFP'/>
